Config.AnimalsStayInside.Name: Animals Staying Inside
Config.AnimalsStayInside.Description: Animals which will stay inside regardless of weather or season conditions
Config.AnimalsGoOutsideBadWeather.Name: Animals Going Outside During Bad Weather
Config.AnimalsGoOutsideBadWeather.Descri: Animals which will go outside during rain or winter, but not during more extreme weather
Config.AnimalsGoOutsideHorribleWeather.N: Animals Going Outside During All Weather
Config.AnimalsGoOutsideHorribleWeather.D: Animals which will go outside regardless of weather or season conditions
Config.DelayedPet.Name: Delayed Petting
Config.DelayedPet.Description: Whether or not to disable petting if the animal is performing an animation (so as to not cancel pigs digging up truffles)
Config.NoTruffleLimit.Name: No Truffle Limit
Config.NoTruffleLimit.Description: Whether or not to disable the limit on digging up truffles
Config.PigAnimalCrackerMultiplier.Name: Pig Animal Cracker Multiplier
Config.PigAnimalCrackerMultiplier.Descri: The multiplier for the chance that pigs will dig up truffles
